name: jdc_person_id
title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

name: quarter_enrolled
title: Quarter Enrolled
description: The financial quarter and year of enrollment

name: state_of_site_enrollment
title: State of Site For Enrollment
description: The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled

name: current_study_status
title: Current Study Status
description: A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in study
enum: On study,Dropped out,Withdrawn by investigator,Completed study,Unknown
examples: MBK: forgot to get client status from a hub so added Unknown -- this hub had Completed studies though so is either Completed or Unknown

name: o2
title: Gender Identity
description: Gender identity
enum: Male,Female,Transgender man/trans man/female-to-male (FTM),Transgender woman/trans woman/male-to-female (MTF),Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female,Additional gender category (or other),Not reported
notes:
For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.] 
False if not 'Male' and not 'Transfgender' else True

name: d4b
title: Gender Identity (condensed)
description: A condensed version of the gender identity common data element
notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]

name: d3_white
title: Race: White
description: Denotes person with European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origin who identifies, or is identified, as White.
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_black
title: Race: Black or African American
description: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_american_indian
title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native
description: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous peoples of North America, who lived on the continent prior to the European colonization. The term includes individuals belonging to a large number of tribes, states, and ethnic groups, many of them still enduring as communities.
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_hawaiian
title: Race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
description: Denotes a person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified.
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_asian
title: Race: Asian
description: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (OMB)
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_other
title: Race: Other
description: A person having origins in a race not identified with other racial categories presented
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_specify_tribe
title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified
description: The specific principal tribe or community if the person answered answered 'yes' to this racial category
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d3_specify_other
title: Race: Other specified
description: The specific racial category of a person having origins in a race not identified with other racial categories presented
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

name: d2
title: Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish Origin
description: A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin regardless of race
jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?

name: d4c
title: Sexual orientation
description: Sexual orientation
enum: Straight or heterosexual,Lesbian or gay,Bisexual,Queer, pansexual, and/or questioning,Something else (specify)
jcoin:core_measure_question: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦?

name: d4c_specify_other
title: Sexual orientation:  Other specified
description: The specific other sexual orientation of a person having a sexual orientation other than the categories presented
jcoin:core_measure_question: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself asâ€¦?

name: d4d
title: Ever pregnant
description: Denotes whether person has ever been pregnant
enum: Never been pregnant,Currenly pregnant,Previously pregnant, had a child,Previously pregnant, did not have a child,Not applicable,Don't know
notes: Does this just apply to that past 90 days?  If not, then the participant should be able to check more than one response.

name: d5
title: Marital status
description: Marital status

name: d5a
title: Married with partner
description: Denotes whether unmarried person is living as married with romantic partner
enum: Yes, I am living as married with partner,No, I am not living as married with partner
jcoin:core_measure_question: Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?

name: d6
title: Education
description: The highest level of education completed
enum: Did not complete high school,GED or equivalent,Regular high school diploma,Some college credit, but less than 1 year of college credit,1 or more years of college credit, but no degree,Associate's degree (e.g., AA or AS),Bachelor's degree (e.g., BA or BS),Graduate degree (e.g., MSW, MA, MS, JD, MD, DSW, EdD, PhD),Other (specify)
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

name: d6_grade
title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)
description: Highest grade level completed, if less than GED or high school diploma
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade completed?

name: d6_specify_other
title: Education: Other specified
description: Denotes educational status other than categories presented
jcoin:core_measure_question: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

name: u14f
title: Interviewed during incarceration
description: Indicates whether or not the person was interviewed during incarceration
jcoin:core_measure_question: Interview conducted with participant during incarceration?

name: u14g
title: Days incarcerated (in past 30/xx days)
description: Number of days incarcerated in past 30/xx days
jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past xx/30 days, how many days have you been incarcerated?

name: u15
title: Medication ever prescribed for opioid use disorder?
description: Indicates whether or not participant has ever been prescribed medication for OUD
jcoin:core_measure_question: Have you ever been prescribed and taken medication to treat opioid use disorder?  (Illicit use should be excluded.)

name: u15a1
title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Lifetime months
description: Number of months participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual
jcoin:core_measure_question: Lifetime months (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

name: u15a2
title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days PTI # days
description: Number of days in past 30/xx PTI days participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual
jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days PTI days (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

name: u15a3
title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx PTI days dose/day
description: Dose per day (in the past 30/xx days PTI) of buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual
notes: Dose/day is the dose taken most often during the 30 days PTI or past 30 days
jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days PTI dose/day (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

name: u15a4
title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days
description: Number of days in past 30/xx days participant was prescribed and took buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual
jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

name: u15a5
title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Past 30/xx days dose/day
description: Dose per day (in the past 30/xx days) of buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual
notes: Dose/day is the dose taken most often during the 30 days PTI or past 30 days
jcoin:core_measure_question: Past 30/xx days dose/day (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])
